questions.skill: Apply properties of circles to find arc length or area
questions.question: A circle has a radius of 6. What is the area of a sector with a central angle of 60°?
questions.explanation: Sector area = (θ/360°) × πr² = (60/360) × π(6)² = (1/6) × 36π = 6π. The sector is 1/6 of the full circle since 60° is 1/6 of 360°.
